definition: to get married (of woman)
(of a woman) to marry/to marry off a daughter/to shift (blame etc)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
the rain will fall, the womenfolk will marry (idiom)/fig. the natural order of things/something you can't go against
pinyin: tian1 yao4 luo4 yu3 , niang2 yao4 jia4 ren2

sentences.english: Heart explain why it changed its name to him and get married.
sentences.chinese: 素心向他解释改名原因和嫁人的事。

sentences.english: She is so young, don't bring up the marriage to her.
sentences.chinese: 她现在还小，别跟她提嫁人的事。

sentences.english: They discuss the housing price problem, This generation won't find a spouse.
sentences.chinese: 他们讲着房价的问题，嫁人娶妻要隔代。

sentences.english: Three close, love mental efforts is gauntly, hurt vitality greatly, china female illegible marry a person.
sentences.chinese: 三分三合，爱得心力憔悴，大伤元气，华女潦草嫁人。

sentences.english: Many young women from Vietnam and Burma are also trafficked, or otherwise sent, into China for the same purpose.
sentences.chinese: 越南和缅甸的许多年轻女性也被卖到或送到中国嫁人。

sentences.english: He said no father ever forces his daughter to marry against her will.
sentences.chinese: 他说没有任何一个父亲曾经强迫他的女儿违心地嫁人。

sentences.english: He had a wife, and I could not marry again, so soon.
sentences.chinese: 他有妻子，我不能这么快又一次嫁人。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Queen made sure the princess did not marry.
sentences.chinese: 为着这个预言，王后一直没有叫公主嫁人。

sentences.english: They discuss the housing price problem, and this generation won't find a spouse.
sentences.chinese: 他们讲着房价的问题，嫁人娶妻要隔代。

sentences.english: But girls should not marry when they are 9 or 10.
sentences.chinese: 但女孩们不应该9岁或10岁就嫁人。

sentences.english: The green smoke thinks the son greatly thinks wife, wanted to get married.
sentences.chinese: 绿烟想着儿大思妻，想嫁人了。

sentences.english: It rains when Heaven deems fit, mother remarries when she wants to.
sentences.chinese: 天要下雨，娘要嫁人，随她去吧。

sentences.english: People say the princess has a partner to marry. He is a messenger from the God.
sentences.chinese: 据说公主要嫁人了，那人是神的信使。

sentences.english: She is still young; don't bring up marriage to her.
sentences.chinese: 她现在还小，别跟她提嫁人的事。

sentences.english: Unfortunately for us, she is happily married since 2005.
sentences.chinese: 真不幸，2005年她幸福地嫁人了。

sentences.english: She is still young, don't bring up marriage to her.
sentences.chinese: 她现在还小，别和她提嫁人的事。
